Fred Clarke  -  $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/18203/clarke-f-hof[/IMG]

James Westlake - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/13730/westlake-sl[/IMG]

The clearance is over, but the original two cards are still available.  I will leave them here until they are sold.

Claretification of the Claret Clearance

I was thinking yesterday about making this thread a Dutch (Not so Much) Auction in terms of pricing.

But I have decided to make it a So Much More Event by adding content daily to the package without bumping the price.

Single cards are still available and will be replaced with comparable cards if sold.

Note:  With limited inventory of claret cards I reserve the right to terminate this Clearance at any time.
Sunday is offer night.  I'm all ears.
Prices good until the Packers lose.;)
